paper_abstract: The m-covering radii of codes are natural generalizations of the covering radii of codes. In this paper we analyze the 2-covering radii of the double error correcting BCH code. In particular, we show that the 2-covering radius of the double error correcting BCH code is (n + 1)/2 sufficiently large n.
paper_title: THE TWO COVERING RADIUS OF THE TWO ERROR CORRECTING BCH CODE
